[b]Portal 2 is brilliant valve game. Old Valve games are very good.[/b]

[b]Disadvantages:[/b]

❌ A Few Bugs that can make your game easy
❌ Old Graphics Engine
❌ Some Boring Levels

[b]Advantages:[/b]

✔️ Very Good Game Mechanics
✔️ Lots of extended levels and Workshop Maps
✔️ Interesting story
✔️ CO-OP
✔️ Logistic Puzzles
          and More

[b]Game has some boring moments, but also has a lot of Adventages that make it pretty nice.[/b]

poggers

The first game was an absolute classic, easily one of the best games ever. So what does Valve do? As any good game developer does, they take what made the first game so great, and build upon it in practically every way. Gameplay, Soundtrack, Story, Characters, Length, Graphics, they're all better, and all worth it. Seriously, they made the practically perfect first game better somehow. Absolutely recommend, but a word of warning - don't wake her up...

Ok, so this game is obviously just a rip off of splitgate, but for a rip off its pretty good, the controls (however theres no run button) are somehow extremley fluent, but besides that it seems like a pretty good fan game. Most of the problems I have with it will probably get patched in the next update along with an easy mode. But in the current state it is. I enjoyed it.
(also the multiplayer is like REALLY GOOD)

this game is a masterpiece. i love playing both of the portal games and even though they didn't make a third game they still make good games. i like exploring with noclip and beating test chambers. i also made my own and i'm proud of making them. i've beaten both games and they're great. if you haven't played portal yet then you should try it. i also have some mods of portal 2 and they're pretty fun too. so what are you waiting for? go play it!

The puzzles are challenging, but not to hard. The music is nice. The story is nice. The atmosphere of the game is something that no other game offers. Its ominous and makes you feel alone. Looking at it now that its aged by 11 years at the time of this review, its even better. It looks like a 2011 game, and i mean that in a good way. Its refreshing to play this instead of the new AAA game all the time. I really like the way the game looks and the way it feels.

заходит значит гейб в магазин. а ему 3 хлеба надо. продовец его спрашивает:
-что будете?
-хлеб-ответил ньюэлл.
-а сколько?
гейб постоял, подумал и сказал:"мне 4и 1 не надо."
